# hiddenRowIndexes

**Instance Property**

The indexes of all hidden table rows.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var hiddenRowIndexes: IndexSet { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is an index set containing the indexes of any hidden table rows. Table rows may be hidden by invoking the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/hideRows(at:withAnimation:)] method. Some drag-and-drop operations also result in hidden rows.

## Hiding and Showing Table Rows

- **hideRows(at:withAnimation:)**: Hides the specified table rows.
- **unhideRows(at:withAnimation:)**: Unhides the specified table rows.
